sentences.sContent: Thank you for your advice; it’s been very helpful.

sentences.sContent: It is helpful if we address a few key questions here.
sentences.sCn: 如果我们在这里解决一些关键问题会很有用的。

sentences.sContent: ...Certain professors believe in-class exams are ultimately more helpful to students...
